title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        History at Sunset Program Postponed  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, History at Sunset Program Postponed  Due to inclement weather, the History at Sunset program scheduled for Saturday, July 30 has been postponed.  The program will be rescheduled for Sunday, August 28, at 5:00 p.m.
